long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Bring the heart-pounding world of Spider-Man to your browser with a stunning live wallpaper that captures him mid-fall, upside down against the city skyline. Perfect for Marvel fans, this extension immerses you in the exhilarating universe of Spider-Man, blending thrilling visuals with essential browser tools for an experience as versatile as the hero himself.

With every new tab, feel Spider-Manâ€™s daring, upside-down leap and the vibrant energy of New York City. This extension offers an unbeatable mix of action-packed visuals and useful features, making it a must-have for fans who want Spider-Manâ€™s fearless spirit in their browsing experience.
